name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Fixer - Instantly Repair Broken Images

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate productivity with Image Fixer: No more broken images!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your web development, testing, and product management tasks with Image Fixer, a Chrome extension designed for developers, testers, and product managers. No more broken images interrupting your workflow! Image Fixer automatically replaces missing images with dynamic placeholders, ensuring a polished and uninterrupted experience. Elevate your productivity today!

After installing the extension, please close and restart Chrome for it to work
